topic.title: Actions Available at Connection Level in Data Source Explorer View

body.p: The contextual menu of a Connection node of the tree from the Data Source Explorer view contains the following actions:

dlentry.dd: Performs a refresh of the selected node's subtree.
Closes the current database connection. If a table is already open, you are warned to close it before proceeding.
Opens theData Sources preferences page where you can configure both data sources and connections.
